styles.name: --il-details-content
styles.description: Content of the detail component (defaults to a space, but can add any unicode character)

styles.name: --il-details-contentopen
styles.description: Content of the detail component when opened (defaults to a space, but can add any unicode character)

styles.name: --il-details-image
styles.description: SVG image using url(''), defaults to the current caret, use url('') to make it blank

styles.name: --il-details-transformopen
styles.description: CSS transform of the image/unicode when it is open (see https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform)

styles.name: --il-details-marginleft
styles.description: Left hand margin of the details, adjustable if you use a larger caret

styles.name: --il-details-background
styles.description: Background color of the details for the solid version

styles.name: --il-details-background-hover
styles.description: Background hover/focus color of the details

styles.name: --il-details-color
styles.description: Background text color of the details for the solid version

styles.name: --il-details-bordered-marginleft
styles.description: Left hand bordered margin of the details, adjustable if you use a larger caret

styles.name: --il-details-bordered-maxwidth
styles.description: Maximum width of the border for the bordered component, default to 900px
